law.text:
Any person subject to this code shall be punished as a court-martial directs who, without authority:
Fails to go to the appointed place of duty at the time prescribed;
Goes from that place; or
Absents himself or herself or remains absent from the unit, organization, or place of duty at which the person is required to be at the time prescribed.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 90, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 61.
